infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to find the Agents near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses Photo Library for uploading your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This App will track your location continuously and in background. This data will be used to show your vehicle position to the client realtime, which will help in improved pickups and drop-offs, also increasing agility and safely in the process.
